findings.title: Mismatch between inline specification and withdraw function
Settle cloned swappers can be destroyed
findings.description: A cloned SynthSwapper that has already been used for settled swaps can be destroyed to save gas on settlement and storage.

findings.title: completeToSynth is callable by any user
findings.description: The function completeToSynth is callable by any user after the maxSecsLeftInWaitingPeriod, which could have impact on external contracts that rely upon calling completeToSynth.

findings.title: States ReadyToSettle PartiallyCompleted , and Completed are never checked and can lead to abnormal calls
findings.description: The states ReadyToSettle, PartiallyCompleted, and Completed are never checked, which can result in abnormal function calls.
